name: Comic Countdown
description:
Thanks for trying out Comic Countdown. In this masterpiece, you play as Gamer Gabe; a comic book collector. Try and get as many comic books as you can to your house. Have Fun and Good Luck! 

When files finish downloading, Click on the ComicCountdown.exe File. This should ask you to extract it, Do that, and click on it again once finished. Have fun!
